definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以關停手機生產部門，或是再次將其出售。

sentences.english: Finance and Administration includes various departments such as …
sentences.chinese: 財務與行政部包括許多不同的部門。

sentences.english: As a safeguard, officers-in-charge of departments are requested to verify identification by comparing signatures.
sentences.chinese: 爲安全起見，部門負責主管應比對簽字檢驗身份。

sentences.english: We begin the year with a grey fowl from Quy Nhon.
sentences.chinese: 我們開始了一年的灰色雞從阮貴部門官員。

sentences.english: The resources of the private sector will also be harnessed by incentivising training through an outcome - based approach.
sentences.chinese: 私營部門的資源也要通過培訓的收入被激勵和利用。

sentences.english: Cross-sectoral international collaboration key to implementing IHR.
sentences.chinese: 跨部門的國際合作是實施《國際衛生條例》的關鍵。

sentences.english: Two are beyond the direct control of the health sector.
sentences.chinese: 其中的兩個危機在衛生部門的直接控制之外。

sentences.english: In a big department store， there are numerous departments selling different kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 大百貨公司裏有許多部門分售各類商品。

sentences.english: Launch an effort to get together the various departments.
sentences.chinese: 開展將各個部門聚集在一起的工作。

sentences.english: Board material cold to press , it processes to be machined one important component.
sentences.chinese: 板料冷衝壓加工是機械加工的一個重要組成部門。

sentences.english: Communication with France was difficult during the telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 電信與郵政部門罷工期間，與法國通訊聯繫很困難。

sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本細則由國務院環境保護部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: Section work. Each operator on the assembly line sews only one part of the garment.
sentences.chinese: 生產部門的每個員工在生產線上只縫紉衣服的一部分。

sentences.english: A changing climate is adding pressure to the already-stressed agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化正在增加農業部門已經承受的壓力。

sentences.english: The department's overall evaluation will be posted next week.
sentences.chinese: 這個部門的整體評量下星期將會公佈。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

definition: to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
